# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-patterns

# shields.io
\bimg\.shields\.io/badge/[-\d\w=&/:;.,?+]*

# IPv6
\b(?:[0-9a-f]{0,4}:){5}[0-9a-f]{0,4}\b

# sha
"[0-9a-f]{64}"

# dovecot
 LMTP id [\w\d+]+

# scala tests
assertEquals\(.* Some\(.*\)
assert\(.*\.contains\(".*"\)
<[-\w\d.+=]+\@[-\w\d.+]+>

# Compiler flags
[\t >"`(](?:-J|)-[DOPWXY]

# ignore long runs of a single character:
\b([A-Za-z])\g{-1}{3,}\b

# <word>v#
[Vv]\d+(?:\b|(?=[a-zA-Z_]))
